changelog.change_log:
The Dragon Bundle is released.
More Wings were added (Axolotl Wings, Bone Wings, Stone Wings, Jester Wings).
Flying mechanic in Beastcraft.
Banjo weapon was added.
Sphynx avatar was added.
Pandy avatar was added.
Special new egg stands with physical buttons for pet purchases.
Pet level up VFX.

Launched cash bundles and released the first bundles.

In Beastcraft:
- Samurai Avatar
- Katana
- 10,000 REMZ

In Animal City:
- Gorilla Avatar
- Gorilla Pet
- 10,000 REMZ

New yoshi avatars:
- potato
- Cave lady
- gorilla tree
- frog

New morph avatars:
- Capybara
- hippo
- cow
- pig

Desert Eggs added with New Desert Animals in Rem City and Animal City.
UI change for truncating long names in the menu.
Click on players in Animal City to open profile page regardless of avatar.
When moving between games, you keep your avatar if available (don't default to panda each time).
Fix for health apples in Morphcraft PvP and Gorilla Craft PvP.

Beastcraft changes:
- lobby in game
- shop that supports special items (with description on how to get them)
- weapons added to shop
- more voxel textures
- Added infection mode
- badges for content creators
- popup when you fail to join private room in Beastcraft

- Three new avatars added to most Remio spaces: Red Panda, Axolotl, and Trashy.
- Bloody Katana added to the weapons in Beastcraft. The price doubles after each purchase of the item.

- Fix Disc tag avatar missing asset
- Juggernauts lightning fix 
- Beastcraft avatar hand animations improvements
- Error handling for promo portals
- Blockit user reporting fix
- Hide server list on Login Menu
- Beastcraft networked shop
- Beastcraft switch to photon voice
- Gorilla and Animal Craft increasing audio distance to 1000

- Use referral codes with friends and get the CAT, LION, and ZOMBIE
- Referrals also get you HOFUND, a new sword in Creature Craft (formerly Stone Age)
- New avatars in Creature Craft are: ZOMBIE and PEBBLE (a stone person)
- Also, the Creature Craft avatars are available in most maps now
- The new avatars in Animal City, Animal Basketball, etc. are: CAT and LION
- A PTERODACTYL is now among the WingIt avatars
- Creature Craft has WEAPONS, including: THOR'S HAMMER, HOFUND, STORMCRUSHER, and PLUNGER
- Eggs have moved to an easier location next to mirrors in Animal City and Rem City
- All avatars have moved into Gorilla Craft PvP
- Finally, we opened Animal Craft PvP, where you can play as only human or Creature Craft Avatar

- Stone Age has an Ogre avatar
- Lava is breakable
- Performance improvements in Animal City and Animal Basketball
- Moderation improvements to reporting
